About this blog

This is the personal website and blog about me, Adam Kemberling. I am a marine science researcher and data scientist located in Portland, ME. This site and its posts are home to research and programming tricks that Iâ€™ve found useful in my career. Here is where I will be sharing quick tutorials on ocean warming and marine ecology workflows, interspersed between pictures of my dog and my scattered thoughts about a career studying climate change.
